entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023
